stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, place 1 power counter on this asset. The first time each turn an agenda is scored or stolen, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters. Do 1 net damage plus 1 net damage for each power counter removed this way.
text:
When your discard phase ends, place 1 power counter on this asset.
The first time each turn an agenda is scored or stolen, you may remove up to 2 hosted power counters. Do 1 net damage plus 1 net damage for each power counter removed this way.
